files.name: main.py
files.content:
bottles = input('How many starting bottles?')

bottles = int(bottles)

if (bottles < 0):
  print('')
  print ('You must enter 1 or more bottles.')
  bottles = int (input('How many starting bottles?'))
while (bottles > 0):
  print ('')
  print (bottles, 'bottles of Slurm on the wall.')
  print (bottles, 'bottles of Slurm..')
  print ('take one down, pass it around..')
  print (bottles - 1, 'bottles of Slurm on the wall')
  bottles = bottles - 1

if (bottles == 0):
  print ('')
  print ('No more bottles of Slurm on the wall!')
